  • Uses of Actor in game.dinosaur

    Subclasses of Actor in game.dinosaur
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Allosaur
    Child class of CarnivoreInterface A carnivorous dinosaur in the game that eats dinos, corpses and eggs
    class  Brachiosaur
    Child class of HerbivoreInterface A herbivourous dinosaur that eats fruits from trees
    class  Pterodactyl
    Child class of CarnivoreInterface A carnivorous dinosaur in the game that eats fish, corpses and eggs and can fly
    class  Stegosaur
    Child class of HerbivoreInterface A herbivourous dinosaur that eats fruits from the ground or bushes

    Locate food action to follow the food and perform the eatActions
    Action ThirstBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Locate water source action to follow the water source and perform the drinkActions
    Action UnconsciousBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Unconscious behavior action to return the action performed by actor if unconscious also creates the corpse if actor hungry or dehydrated for too long
